name: Read and Execute a File Via Cmd.exe
description: Detect use of "/R <" to read and execute a file via cmd.exe
query: ((process.pe.original_file_name:/[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR process.executable:/.*\\[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND ((process.parent.command_line:/.*[Cc][Mm][Dd]\ .*/ AND process.parent.command_line:/.*\/[Rr]\ .*/ AND process.parent.command_line:/.*\<.*/) OR (process.command_line:/.*[Cc][Mm][Dd]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\/[Rr]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\<.*/)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.pe.original_file_name:Cmd.Exe OR process.executable:*\\cmd.exe) AND ((process.parent.command_line:*cmd\ * AND process.parent.command_line:*\/r\ * AND process.parent.command_line:*<*) OR (process.command_line:*cmd\ * AND process.command_line:*\/r\ * AND process.command_line:*<*)))`
